info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 9:23AM PDT until August 21 at 12:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 1230 PM PDT. * At 923 AM PDT, Excessive runoff in creeks and washes from the earlier heavy rain fall continues around Mount Charleston. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Video and gauges reports. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Rainbow Canyon, Mt. Charleston, Spring Mountains, Hilltop Campground, Mahogany Grove Campground, Kyle Canyon Campground, Fletcher View Campground, Mary Jane Falls Campground, Dolomite Campground and Mcwilliams Campground. Please stay away from Mount Charleston as signficant flooding and flood damage has occurred. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
